resources.string: 1.Why shoud i buy online?\n Ans: Because we provide greate deals and free home delivery.
2.How can place an order?\n Ans: Search through our wide range of produce and select or just call on our coustomer care and give your order details and item to modify.

3.How do i returne an item i am not satisfied?\n Ans:We maintain an absolute "No question asked" policy at the time of delivery .if you are not satisfy with the excellenc freshness or quailty of the products plase do return the necessary item to the delivery executive at time of delivery.
